title: 2 Pack Mens Athletic Shorts 5 Inch Quick Dry Gym Workout Shorts Men Lightweight Sports Running Shorts with Pockets

These mens shorts with zipper pockets are designed with professional three-dimensional cut for a perfect fit, elastic waist with inner drawstring, 2 slash pockets and 2 zipper pockets providing plenty of storage space. There's no need to worry about carrying your belongings when running or working out, so you can stretch out and exercise with release.

We are committed to persistently optimise and polish our products so that they can be suitable in more appropriate situations for you. The mens workout shorts 5 inch inseam are perfect for sports, running, work out, and even everyday casual wear. Yet they are also a great gift for your friends and family.

Perfection in every detail of our products is our relentless pursuit. These running shorts for men 5 inch are designed to be simple and practical for sports enthusiasts, allowing you to work up a sweat when you're working out, or to feel free and comfortable when you're relaxing at home.
Machine cold wash or hand wash, no ironing. If you prefer loose fit, you can choose one size up. Please check the size chart picture of these training short shorts for men carefully before ordering.
